Text.Page: "A book is more powerful than any weapon," says an old proverb. Read books and teach yourself about a wiser life.

Allemantheia is the city of magic built by the high elves. (Details omitted.)

To control the energy from the Flower of Life, Serion created—and became—the Core. (Details omitted.)

The Core supplies the high elves with an unlimited supply of mana. (Details omitted.)

Finish studying already? You must be smarter than you look.

Get ready to take a test. We do a lot of tests around here.
Who created the Core?
Bingo! You didn't just skip the reading.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Did I get it right?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Yes, you did. I expected nothing less.
He's an important figure, but not the right answer.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I might have, um, skimmed the book."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Go back to Collegium Arcane and study harder, <PCNAME>!
I'm sorry, but the Flower of Life held the energy that the Core now holds.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I should study more."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Yes, you should indeed study harder.
She isn't the right answer.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Was that really in the book?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
It's all in the book. Go back to Collegium Arcane and read it again.
Where do High Elves get their mana from?
The Flower of Life was once a power source, but it is no more.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Can I guess again?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Yes, guess again—after you go to Collegium Arcane and read the book.

Bingo!
You studied hard, ."Did I get it right?"
Yes, you did. Success as expected!
These are not supposed to be difficult, <PCNAME>!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I'll study harder."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
See that you do. Go back to Collegium Arcane.
Serion is the high elf who created the Core—by becoming the Core.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I will study more."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Yes, go back to Collegium Arcane, and pay attention this time.
Here's an easy one; the answer is all around you. High elves built this city of magic on the continent of Shara. What's the name of this city?
No, that's not it at all.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I'll pay more attention next time."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Hit the books! Go back to Collegium Arcane and study harder.
He's an important figure, but not the right answer.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I should have taken notes."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Use whatever study technique you like, but go back to Collegium Arcane and study harder.
A simple question, and a correct answer.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Did I get it right?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Yes, you did. You're a quick study.
That's not just incorrect. It's unbelievably wrong!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Can it be an open-book test?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
No, you must study and remember. Go back to Collegium Arcane and study harder.
Serion stored energy from here within the Core. Where did the energy come from?
That's the name of an elf. Are you just guessing?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Incorrectly, it seems."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
We prefer certainty to guesswork. Go back to Collegium Arcane and study harder.
He's an important figure, but not the right answer.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Do I get a second chance?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Yes, after you go back to Collegium Arcane and study the book again.
Your ignorance leaves me speechless! Well, nearly speechless...<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I can do better!"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
You'll have your chance. Go back to Collegium Arcane and study harder.
Your answer matches the truth.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I got it right?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Indeed, you were correct.
Keep studying hard, <PCNAME>. You'll become a great theoretician one day.
